properties.name: appendTo
properties.description:
appendTo allows the tooltip to be displayed from another element in the DOM. Set appendTo to an HTMLElement or to a css query selector string and the tooltip will display from the element.
This is usefull when you want to override neighboring z-indexes or overflows.
Be aware that the appended tooltip content will inherit styles from its new host.

properties.name: isAutoOrientation
properties.description: Auto-corrects orientation based on target position

properties.name: positionStrategy
properties.description: The way the tooltip is positionned relative to the trigger. Default is 'absolute'. 'fixed' appears the same, but ignores overflows.

properties.name: showTooltip
properties.description: Defined if tooltip is open or closed

properties.name: target
properties.description: The HTML element that will trigger the popover. Can pass an HTML element or a CSS selector query string.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Allows width of tooltip box to be resized. Tooltip width can be set to auto or to a specific width in pixels. Maximum width of tooltip is 280px.

methods.name: close
methods.description: This function is called when popover is closed

methods.name: open
methods.description: This function is called when popover is opened

EDSTooltip.description: The **tooltip** can only be invoked via hover. For best practice, it should be limited to concise text. Otherwise, it is recommended to use popover.
EDSTooltip.name: Tooltip
EDSTooltip.usage:
The tooltip finds its target through a slot which allows you to pass said target to the tooltip (link to slots on MDN). For the tooltip slot which is named "target", you need to add slot=“target” on the most outer HTML of the target you are passing to the tooltip, e.g: ```html

HOVER ME

 ``` CSS Variable | Description :----------------|:------------- --eds-tooltip-background-color | Background color for tooltip --eds-tooltip-caret-color | Background color for tooltip caret --eds-tooltip-text-color | Text color for tooltip
